summary: Results-driven delivery driver with 2+ years of experience, seeking a part-time role at Fatburger/Round Table Pizza. Skilled in customer service, sales transaction processing, and order fulfillment. Possesses a clean driving record, valid driver's license, and reliable transportation. Proficient in handling cash and credit card transactions, with experience in store opening/closing procedures and food preparation. A team player with excellent communication skills, able to work in a fast-paced environment and provide great guest services.

bullets: Executed high-volume, last-mile delivery operations, maintaining a 4.9+ performance rating through route optimization and superior customer service.
Leveraged local geographic knowledge to navigate complex delivery windows and solve on-road logistical challenges in real-time.
Orchestrated logistics for a high-volume agricultural shipper, managing a fleet of 20+ drivers and 60+ daily outbound shipments.
Identified systemic bottlenecks in the manual scheduling process; designed and implemented a custom scheduling system that reduced downtime by 30% and improved fleet utilization.

education: Associate of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
